content:
addRule()
	.when(Query.fromType(org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.xml.model.XmlFileModel).gremlin()
		.has(fileName,EQUALS,ibm-webservices-bnd.xmi)
		.has(rootTagName,EQUALS,WSBinding)
		.as(default)
)
	.perform(Iteration.over(?).perform(Discover WebSphere Web Service Binding XML Files)
)
withId("ResolveWebSphereWsBindingXmlRuleProvider_1")
